segments.text: I see a kitchen scene, quite ordinary at first glance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: An adult woman stands at the sink, focused intently on drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her back is partially to me, as she faces towards the left.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the single basin sink is completely overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is cascading steadily over the front edge, pooling on the counter and dripping onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's forming a widening puddle right where she stands.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One of her feet is already immersed in the water, yet she shows absolutely no sign of noticing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expression remains perfectly neutral, almost serene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's truly astonishing how oblivious she is to the spreading flood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I worry about the potential water damage to the cabinets below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This situation could quickly become much worse if left unattended.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she hasn't looked down even once.
segments.speaker: PAR
